verbs.description: [ARG0: The former senior adviser to John McCain ’s presidential campaign] [V: said] [ARG1: it has become “ fully the party of Trump] . ”
The former senior adviser to John McCain ’s presidential campaign said it [V: has] become “ fully the party of Trump . ”
The former senior adviser to John McCain ’s presidential campaign said [ARG1: it] has [V: become] “ [ARG2: fully the party of Trump] . ”
